Get your site up and running
doesn\'t it feel good to cross things off a list?
Tap %1$s View Site %2$s to preview your site
Preview your new site to see what your visitors will see.
The quick tour will guide you through building a basic site. Are you sure you want to skip?
Tap the %1$s Connections %2$s to add your social media accounts
Connect to your social media accounts – your site will automatically share new posts.
Tap %1$s Create Post %2$s to create a new post
It\'s time! Draft and publish your very first post.
Want a little help getting started?
Our Quick Start checklist walks you through the basics of setting up a new website.
Tap %1$s Search %2$s to look for sites with similar interests
Find sites that speak to you, and follow them to get updates when they publish.
Tap %1$s Customize %2$s to start personalizing your site
Change colours, fonts, and images for a perfectly personalized site.
Time to finish setting up your site! Our checklist walks you through the next steps.
Tap %1$s Themes %2$s to discover new themes
Browse all our themes to find your perfect fit.
Add tags here to find posts about your favourite topics
Log in to the WordPress.com account you used to connect Jetpack.
Jetpack could not be installed at this time
You have Jetpack installed on your site. Congratulations!
Installing Jetpack on your site. This can take up to a few minutes to complete
Your website credentials will not be stored and are used only for the purpose of installing Jetpack
By setting up Jetpack you agree to our
To use Stats on your WordPress site, you\'ll need to install the Jetpack plugin.
What would you like to find?
Add your frequently used tags here so they can be quickly selected when tagging your posts
You have changes to posts that haven’t been uploaded to your site. Logging out now will delete those changes from your device. Log out anyway?
As of August 1, 2018, Facebook no longer allows direct sharing of posts to Facebook Profiles. Connections to Facebook Pages remain unchanged.
Posts that you like will appear here
You are not following any sites yet. Why not follow one now?
Since you\'re on a free plan, you\'ll see limited events in your activity.
When you make changes to your site you\'ll be able to see your activity history here
There was an error in discarding your local changes. Please contact support for more assistance.
To continue please enter your email address and name
Are you sure you want to rewind your site back to %1$s at %2$s? This will remove all content and options created or changed since then.
Your site has been successfully restored
Your site has been successfully restored\nRewound to %1$s %2$s
Your site is being restored\nRewinding to %1$s %2$s
Save this post, and come back to read it whenever you\'d like. It will only be available on this device — saved posts don\'t sync to your other devices. (Yet! We\'re working on it.)
Tap %s to save a post to your list.
New post. Write a new post.
You don\'t have permission to edit the site icon.
You don\'t have permission to add a site icon.
How would you like to edit the icon?
Would you like to add a site icon?
We use other tracking tools, including some from third parties. Read about these and how to control them.
This information helps us improve our products, make marketing to you more relevant, personalize your WordPress.com experience, and more as detailed in our privacy policy.
Share information with our analytics tool about your use of services while logged in to your WordPress.com account.
Plugin feature requires the site to be in good standing.
Plugin feature requires primary domain subscription to be associated with this user.
Plugin cannot be installed on VIP sites.
Plugin cannot be installed due to disk space limitations.
Plugin feature requires a verified email address.
Plugin feature requires the site to be public.
Plugin feature requires a business plan.
Plugin feature requires a custom domain.
Plugin feature is not available for this site.
We\'re doing the final setup — almost done…
Installing the first plugin on your site can take up to 1 minute. During this time you won’t be able to make changes to your site.

The tagline is a short line of text shown right below the title in most themes, and act as site metadata on search engines.
Type a keyword for more ideas
Pick an available \"yourname.wordpress.com\" address to let people find you on the web.
Tell us more about what you\'re creating. What\'s the title and tagline?
Get started fast with one of our popular themes. Once your site is created, you can browse and choose from hundreds more.
To present your creative projects in a visual showcase.
To promote your business or brand and connect with your audience.
To share your ideas, stories and photographs with your followers.
What kind of site do you need?\nChoose an option below:
Google took too long to respond. You may need to wait until you have a stronger internet connection.
Your current username is %1$s%2$s%3$s. With few exceptions, others will only ever see your display name, %4$s%5$s%6$s.
No usernames are suggested from %1$s%2$s%3$s. Please enter more letters or numbers to get suggestions.
An error occurred while retrieving username suggestions.
Email already exists on WordPress.com.\nProceeding with login.
By signing up, you agree to our %1$sTerms of Service%2$s.
We sent you a magic signup link! Check your email on this device, and tap the link in the email to finish signing up.
There was some trouble sending the email. You can retry now or close and try again later.
You can always log in with a magic link like the one you just used, but you can also set up a password if you prefer.
There was some trouble updating your account. You can retry or revert your changes to continue.
There was some trouble uploading your avatar.
To create your new WordPress.com account, please enter your email address.
There was some trouble checking the email address.
Log in by entering your site address.
Create a new site for your business, magazine, or personal blog; or connect an existing WordPress installation.
To get helpful notifications on your device from your WordPress site, you\'ll need to install the Jetpack plugin. Would you like to set up Jetpack?

Improve your site\'s speed by only loading images visible on the screen. New images will load just before they scroll into view. This prevents viewers from having to download all the images on a page all at once, even ones they can\'t see.
Jetpack will optimize your images and serve them from the server location nearest to your visitors. Using our global content delivery network will boost the loading speed of your site.
A tag with this name already exists
Your WordPress.com site supports the use of Accelerated Mobile Pages, a Google-led initiative that dramatically speeds up loading times on mobile devices
Learn more about date & time formatting
Choose a city in your timezone
Are you sure you want to remove %1$s from %2$s?\n\nThis will deactivate the plugin and delete all associated files and data.
An error occurred while configuring the plugin: %s
Open link in a new window/tab
Please provide an authentication code to continue.
Please double check your password to continue.
Google login could not be started.
We sent a text message to the phone number ending in %s. Please enter the verification code in the SMS.
Unable to upload this post\'s media
Remove this image from the post?
There was some trouble connecting with the Google account.
To proceed with this Google account, please provide the matching WordPress.com password. This will be asked only once.
A network error occurred. Please check your connection and try again.
Log in to WordPress.com to share the content.
Enter the address of your WordPress site you\'d like to share the content to.
Are you sure you want to disconnect Jetpack from the site?

You may whitelist an IP address or series of addresses preventing them from ever being blocked by Jetpack. IPv4 and IPv6 are acceptable. To specify a range, enter the low value and high value separated by a dash. Example: 12.12.12.1–12.12.12.100
Permissions required in order to share images or videos
Turning Notification Settings off will disable all notifications from this app, regardless of type. You can fine-tune which kind of notification you receive after turning Notification Settings on.
To receive notifications on this device, turn Notification Settings on.

Your site address appears in the bar at the top of the screen when you visit your site in Chrome.
Need help finding your site address?
Enter the address of your WordPress site you\'d like to connect.
Your magic link is on its way! Check your email on this device and tap the link in the email you received from WordPress.com.
We\'ll email you a magic link that\'ll log you in instantly, no password needed. Hunt and peck no more!
It looks like this password is incorrect. Please double check your information and try again.
Requesting a verification code via SMS.
Almost there! Please enter the verification code from your Authenticator app.
Log in to WordPress.com using an email address to manage all your WordPress sites.
Manage your Jetpack-powered site on the go — you\'ve got WordPress in your pocket.
Your notifications travel with you — see comments and likes as they happen.
Catch up with your favourite sites and join the conversation anywhere, any time.
Watch readers from around the world read and interact with your site — in realtime.
Publish from the park. Blog from the bus. Comment from the café. WordPress goes where you go.
Image optimization shrinks images for quicker uploading.\n\nYou can change this any time in site settings.
Can\'t stop the upload because it\'s already finished

My Site. View your site and manage it, including stats.

Couldn\'t connect to the WordPress site. There is no valid WordPress site at this\n address. Check the site address (URL) you entered.
Couldn\'t connect. We received a 403 error when trying to access your\n site XMLRPC endpoint. The app needs that in order to communicate with your site. Contact your host to solve\n this problem.
Couldn\'t connect. Your host is blocking POST requests, and the app needs\n that in order to communicate with your site. Contact your host to solve this problem.
Don\'t leave it hanging! \'%1$s\' is waiting to be published.

Export your site to an XML file
There was an error in deleting your site. Please contact support for more assistance.
Please type in %1$s in the field below to confirm. Your site will then be gone forever.

If you want a site but don\'t want any of the posts and pages you have now, our support team can delete your posts, pages, media and comments for you.\n\nThis will keep your site and URL active, but give you a fresh start on your content creation. Just contact us to have your current content cleared out.

Break comment threads into multiple pages.
When a comment contains any of these words in its content, name, URL, email, or IP, it will be marked as spam. You can enter partial words, so \"press\" will match \"WordPress.\"
When a comment contains any of these words in its content, name, URL, email, or IP, it will be held in the moderation queue. You can enter partial words, so \"press\" will match \"WordPress.\"
You can override these settings for individual posts.

If you\'ve uploaded videos using VideoPress, find out how many times they’ve been watched.

Keep track of your overall number of followers, and how long each one has been following your site.
